cause.description:
LADIES AND GENTLEMEN IT IS TIME FOR A CHANGE AND HILARY IS THE KEY TARGET TO THAT CHANGE! IF WE CAN GET HILARY IN THE WHITE HOUSE THEN BILL CAN TAKE OVER AND MAKE THIS WORLD A MORE INTERESTING PLACE!
1. BUSH MUST GET THE HELL OUT THE WHITE HOUSE!
2. GAS MUST GO DOWN!
3. WE NEED MORE ENTERTAINMENT GOING ON IN THE WHITE HOUSE AND ONLY BILL CAN CHANGE THAT!
cause.mission: GET BILL BACK IN THE WHITE HOUSE!
cause.name: HILARY CLINTON FOR PRESIDENT!
